mapper.delete: delete from cart where cart_id = #{cart_id} and user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select p.product_id, c.cart_id, product_name, product_price, detail, product_img, c.product_cnt, p.soldout_YN, p.status from product p left join cart c on(p.product_id = c.product_id) where c.user_id = #{user_id} and p.soldout_YN ='N' and p.status ='판매중' order by p.product_id
select count(product_id) from cart where user_id = #{user_id} and product_id = #{product_id}
